article:
Wilbur is Fern's pet pig. He is only 7 days  _ . For the first week, Wilbur is  _  a box.
Fern loves Wilbur very much. She  _ to be with him, to feed  him, to put him to bed. Every morning, _ she gets up, she warms his milk, gives the milk breakfast to him. Every _ , when the school bus is in front of Wilbur's home, she  jumps out of the school bus and goes to get milk for _ . She feeds him at dinner time, and just before _  to bed. Fern's mother gives him a feeding at _  time each day, when Fern is in school. Wilbur loves his milk, and he is very _  when Fern is giving milk to him. He always _ at Wilbur with his lovely eyes.
Mr. Arable, Fern's father, makes Wilbur a small room, a big box _ straw . _  an apple tree.
" _ he cold at night?" asks Fern.
"No," says Fern's father. "You watch and see what he does. "
